channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Amazon’s stock is a ‘must add’ ahead of earnings, according to this analyst

item.title: Why David Einhorn’s Greenlight prefers this tiny biotech over AI ‘excitement’
item.description: Greenlight Capital’s third-quarter investor letter had almost nothing good to say about the hot AI trend, but it does have faith in a tiny biotech.

item.title: Here’s when the shutdown will really hurt the quality of key reports like CPI and the unemployment rate

item.title: Why Texas Instruments’ stock is seeing another big drop after earnings
item.description: The analog chip company’s latest results suggest a more subdued path to recovery.

item.title: Beyond Meat’s stock is up 1,200% in four days as blistering meme-stock rally rocks on
item.description: Shares of Beyond Meat Inc. soared on Wednesday as a blistering meme-stock rally entered its fourth day. Since it started, the stock has risen by about...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
